properties.name: appoutlet.synchronization.cron
properties.description: Cron expression to trigger synchronization task.

properties.name: appoutlet.synchronization.snap-store.enable
properties.description: Enable or disable synchronization for snap store.

properties.name: appoutlet.synchronization.app-image-hub.enable
properties.description: Enable or disable synchronization for AppImageHub.

properties.name: appoutlet.synchronization.flathub.enable
properties.description: Enable or disable synchronization for FlatHub.
